artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,154.1); a woman in a white gown with a blue cape with brown fur trim and a large brown muff with white detailing and a purple bow
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate III from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Troisième Cahier, 10 Décembre 1786
